title: Watch ‘Plan B: The Fall & Rise’, a Jumbo-Visma film
content:
We know that you love a good cycling documentary and today we’ve got a great one to share with you.

‘Plan B: The Fall & Rise’ is the story about how a dramatic first week of the 2021 Tour de France turned into Jumbo-Visma’s best Tour performance ever, with a second place in the GC and four individual stage wins (granted, three of those came from the ever-versatile Wout van Aert).

In this documentary you get a look behind the scenes at the Dutch cycling team. You’ll take your place in the team bus when Primož Roglič steps in injured after his fall, and will sit close to the most important meeting of the Tour where, under the leadership of sports director Merijn Zeeman, a Plan B is being forged.

Sit back, relax, and relive this memorable Tour de France journey!

Plan B: The Fall & Rise is available on-demand for a short time only, via the link below.
